item.title: 由于中国对钢铁征收更多关税，铁矿石结束了连续四日的上涨行情
item.description: 大连铁矿石期货价格周一结束了四日连涨，原因是对中国钢材征收的关税不断增加，抑制了这种关键炼钢原料的需求前景，但中国港口库存的减少限制了铁矿石期货价格的跌幅。【原文：Dalian iron ore futures prices snapped a four-day winning streak on Monday as increasing levies on Chinese steel dampened demand prospects for the key steelmaking ingredient, though decreasing portside inventories in China limited the fall.】

item.title: 马斯克的 "星链 "公司与中国竞争对手争夺卫星互联网主导权
item.description: 对于埃隆-马斯克来说，太空将变得更加拥挤。【原文：Space is about to get more crowded for Elon Musk.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴未来 3 年将在人工智能领域投资超过 520 亿美元
item.description: 阿里巴巴周一表示，计划在未来三年内向云计算和人工智能基础设施投资至少3800亿元人民币（524.4亿美元）。【原文：Alibaba said on Monday it plans to invest at least 380 billion yuan ($52.44 billion) in its cloud computing and artificial intelligence infrastructure over the next three years.】

item.title: 库尔德斯坦石油供应有待恢复，石油价格下跌
item.description: 周一早盘，油价下滑，扩大了上周的跌幅，原因是库尔德斯坦油田有望恢复出口，而投资者则在等待俄罗斯结束乌克兰战争的谈判结果。【原文：Oil prices slipped in early trade on Monday, extending losses from last week, on the prospect of a resumption of exports from Kurdistan's oilfields, while investors awaited clarity on talks to end Russia's war on Ukraine.】

item.title: 400亿澳元被一扫而空，澳大利亚主要银行股迎来喘息机会
item.description: 在过去八个交易日的大幅抛售使澳大利亚顶级银行的市值缩水超过 630 亿澳元（400 亿美元）之后，这些银行的股票在周一得到了喘息。【原文：Shares of top Australian banks took a breather on Monday, after a sharp sell-off over the past eight sessions wiped off more than A$63 billion ($40 billion) from their market value.】

item.title: 德国股票期货和欧元因默茨获胜而上扬
item.description: 周一，由于德国大选没有带来令人意外的惊喜，欧洲股市保持稳定，而华尔街期货走强，因为人们希望人工智能天后英伟达（Nvidia）本周的业绩将证明科技行业的高估值是合理的。【原文：European shares steadied on Monday as Germany's election produced no nasty surprise, while Wall Street futures firmed on hopes results from AI diva Nvidia this week would justify the tech sector's sky-high valuations.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 Perpetual 公司结束与 KKR 关于出售财富和信托单位的谈判
item.description: 澳大利亚 Perpetual 有限公司周一表示，已结束与 KKR 就出售财富管理和企业信托部门的谈判，同时确认了单独出售财富管理业务的计划。【原文：Australia's Perpetual Ltd on Monday said it has ended talks with KKR for the sale of its wealth management and corporate trust units, while confirming plans to pursue a sale of its wealth management business separately.】

item.title: BBVA 将可持续融资目标提高至 7000 亿欧元
item.description: 西班牙对外银行（BBVA）周一表示，该行已将未来五年内向其认为可持续发展的企业提供贷款的目标提高到 7000 亿欧元（约合 7,327 亿美元）。【原文：BBVA has increased its target for lending to businesses the Spanish bank considers sustainable to 700 billion euros ($732.7 billion) over the next five years, it said on Monday.】

item.title: 早间竞价美国经济增长担忧加剧关税紧张
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 大选预测对德国萎靡不振的经济意味着什么？
item.description: 德国反对党保守派基民盟/基社盟在周日的全国大选中获胜，其领导人弗里德里希-梅尔茨有望成为下一任总理，而极右翼的德国选择党（AfD）则获得了第二名，这是其有史以来最好的成绩。【原文：Germany's opposition conservatives CDU/CSU won the national election on Sunday, putting leader Friedrich Merz on track to be the next chancellor while the far-right Alternative for Germany (AfD)came in second, its best ever result, projections showed.】

item.title: 美国要求欧盟反垄断负责人澄清约束大科技公司的规则
item.description: 美国众议院司法委员会主席吉姆-乔丹（Jim Jordan）周日要求欧盟反垄断负责人特雷莎-里贝拉（Teresa Ribera）澄清她是如何执行欧盟约束大科技公司的规则的，称这些规则似乎是针对美国公司的。【原文：U.S. House Judiciary Chair Jim Jordan on Sunday demanded EU antitrust chief Teresa Ribera clarify how she enforces the European Union's rules reining in Big Tech, saying they appear to target U.S. companies.】

item.title: 特朗普特使称，如果达成和平协议，美国公司可在俄罗斯开展业务
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的特使史蒂夫-威特科夫（Steve Witkoff）周日表示，如果俄乌战争达成和平协议，美国公司有望在俄罗斯开展业务。【原文：President Donald Trump's special envoy Steve Witkoff said on Sunday that there would be an expectation that U.S. firms may do business in Russia in the event of a peace deal in the Russia-Ukraine war.】

item.title: 卡塔尔与 Scale AI 签订协议，利用人工智能提升政府服务水平
item.description: Scale AI 公司的一位高管周日告诉路透社，卡塔尔政府已与人工智能数据公司 Scale AI 签署了一份为期五年的协议，将部署人工智能驱动的工具和培训，以推动改善这个海湾阿拉伯国家的政府服务。【原文：Qatar's government has signed a five-year deal with AI data company Scale AI to deploy AI-powered tools and training in a push to improve government services in the Gulf Arab state, a senior Scale AI executive told Reuters on Sunday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚对 Telegram 延迟回答虐待儿童和恐怖问题处以罚款
item.description: 澳大利亚网络安全监管机构周一对消息平台 Telegram 处以约 100 万澳元（64 万美元）的罚款，原因是该公司迟迟没有回答有关该应用为防止虐待儿童和暴力极端主义材料传播而采取的措施的问题。【原文：Australia's online safety regulator on Monday fined messaging platform Telegram about A$1 million ($640,000) for its delay in answering questions about measures the app took to prevent the spread of child abuse and violent extremist material.】

item.title: 特朗普称美国 "非常接近 "与乌克兰达成矿产协议
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周六表示，作为结束乌克兰战争努力的一部分，美国正与乌克兰就分享乌克兰矿产收入达成一项协议。【原文：President Donald Trump said on Saturday the United States is close an agreement with Ukraine on sharing revenue from Ukrainian minerals as part of efforts to end the Ukraine war.】

item.title: 伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司从年度报告中删除多样性和包容性内容
item.description: 沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）的伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）周六加入了越来越多的美国公司的行列，这些公司公开改变了讨论其对多元化和包容性承诺的方式。【原文：Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway on Saturday joined a growing list of American companies to publicly change their approach to discussing their commitment to diversity and inclusion.】

item.title: 贝森特表示经济伙伴关系将保护乌克兰人和美国纳税人
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）在周六为《金融时报》撰写的一篇评论文章中写道，乌克兰和美国之间的经济伙伴关系将使两国受益。【原文：An economic partnership between Ukraine and the U.S. would benefit both countries, U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent wrote in an opinion piece for the Financial Times on Saturday.】

item.title: 草案显示欧盟将缩减企业可持续发展规则
item.description: 路透社看到的一份文件草案显示，欧盟委员会计划减少面临欧盟可持续发展报告要求的公司数量，这是其减少企业繁文缛节举措的一部分。【原文：The European Commission plans to cut back the number of companies facing EU sustainability reporting requirements, as part of its drive to cut red tape for businesses, a draft document seen by Reuters showed.】

item.title: 宝马表示将重新考虑在英国生产电动迷你车的时间安排
item.description: 宝马公司周六表示，正在重新考虑在英国生产全电动迷你汽车的时间表，理由是该行业面临着不确定性。【原文：BMW said on Saturday it is rethinking its timetable for manufacturing all-electric Mini cars in Britain, citing uncertainties facing the industry.】

item.title: 伯克希尔将加大对日本贸易公司的投资
item.description: 沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）周六表示，他的企业集团伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）可能会增持其持有的五家日本贸易公司的股份。【原文：Warren Buffett said on Saturday that his conglomerate Berkshire Hathaway will likely increase its ownership in the five Japanese trading houses it holds.】

item.title: 波兰副总理称波兰为乌克兰订购星链支付费用
item.description: 波兰周六表示，尽管有消息称美国可能会考虑切断乌克兰对卫星互联网系统的使用，但波兰一直在为乌克兰的星链订购支付费用，并将继续这样做。【原文：Poland said on Saturday it has been paying for Ukraine's Starlink subscription and will continue to do so despite sources saying the United States could consider cutting Ukraine's access to the satellite internet system.】

item.title: 沃伦-巴菲特称美国应 "明智消费"，计划增加对日本的投资
item.description: 94 岁高龄的巴菲特在年度信函中也承认了自己的高龄，他告诉股东们，他现在使用拐杖，在 5 月份的伯克希尔年度会议上回答股东们问题的时间会减少。【原文：The 94-year-old Buffett also acknowledged his advanced age in his annual letter, telling shareholders he now uses a cane and will spend less time fielding their questions at Berkshire's annual meeting in May.】

item.title: 巴菲特的伯克希尔公司因保险和投资实现创纪录利润
item.description: 沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）的伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）周六公布了连续第三个创纪录的年度营业利润，这主要得益于其保险业务承保盈利和投资收益的大幅增长。【原文：Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway on Saturday posted its third straight record annual operating profit, bolstered by large increases in underwriting earnings and investment income in its insurance businesses.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局称，Stellantis公司因后视摄像头图像问题召回27354辆美国汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（National Highway Traffic Safety Administration）周六表示，由于后视摄像头图像无法显示，Stellantis公司将在美国召回27354辆玛莎拉蒂汽车。【原文：Stellantis is recalling 27,354 Maserati vehicles in the U.S over concerns of a rearview camera image that does not display, the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Saturday.】

item.title: 媒体称 Seven & i Holdings 选择贝恩作为资产出售的首选买家
item.description: 据当地媒体周六报道，7-Eleven 连锁便利店运营商日本 Seven & i 控股公司已选择贝恩资本作为其非核心资产股份的首选买家。【原文：Japan's Seven & i Holdings , operator of the 7-Eleven convenience store chain, has picked Bain Capital as its preferred buyer for a stake of its non-core assets, local media reported on Saturday.】

item.title: 欧洲央行维勒鲁瓦重申今年夏天存款利率可能达到 2
item.description: 法国央行行长兼欧洲央行决策者弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）在周六发表的一篇访谈中表示，欧洲央行可能在今年夏天之前将存款利率下调至 2%。【原文：The European Central Bank could cut its deposit rate down to 2% by this summer, said Bank of France head and ECB policymaker Francois Villeroy de Galhau in an interview published on Saturday.】

item.title: 备忘录显示波音首席航空安全官即将退休
item.description: 根据路透社周五看到的一份备忘录，波音公司首席航空航天安全官迈克-德莱尼（Mike Delaney）将于今年晚些时候退休。【原文：Boeing's chief aerospace safety officer, Mike Delaney, will retire later this year, according to memo seen by Reuters on Friday.】

item.title: 巴西法官在 "审查 "纠纷后暂停 Rumble 平台运行
item.description: 巴西最高法院周五以美国视频共享平台 Rumble 未遵守法院命令为由，下令暂停其在巴西的业务，这与埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 X 公司去年面临的情况类似。【原文：Brazil's Supreme Court on Friday ordered the suspension of U.S. video-sharing platform Rumble in the country, citing its failure to comply with court orders, in a similar path to the one faced by Elon Musk's X last year.】

item.title: 高盛称，特朗普征收 10%的石油关税可能导致外国生产商每年损失 100 亿美元
item.description: 高盛（Goldman Sachs）周五表示，由于替代买家和加工能力有限，加拿大和拉丁美洲的重质原油仍然依赖于美国炼油厂，因此拟议中的 10%美国石油关税可能会使外国生产商每年损失 100 亿美元。【原文：Goldman Sachs said on Friday a proposed 10% U.S. oil tariff could cost foreign producers $10 billion per year, as Canadian and Latin American heavy crudes remain reliant on U.S. refiners due to limited alternative buyers and processing capabilities.】

item.title: 独家新闻消息人士称美国可能因矿产问题切断乌克兰使用星链互联网服务的渠道
item.description: 三位熟知内情的消息人士告诉路透社，美国谈判代表向基辅施压，要求乌克兰获得关键矿产，并提出了切断该国使用埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）重要的星链（Starlink）卫星互联网系统的可能性。【原文：U.S. negotiators pressing Kyiv for access to Ukraine's critical minerals have raised the possibility of cutting the country's access to Elon Musk's vital Starlink satellite internet system, three sources familiar with the matter told Reuters.】
